summary: The diff updates Header/Footer/index.html to reference the new generated logo/icon filenames and adds developer-facing comments documenting those paths. However, no actual logo/image asset files were added under frontend/public/assets/generated/, so the core asset-generation/export requirements are not implemented. Additionally, frontend-file-summaries.txt claims a large set of unrelated UI/features not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and add the finalized official “STYO Tech Neon” logo asset set as background-free, optimized vector assets (full + icon-only), subtle/sharp glow, no rasterized glow, scalable cleanly, and place them under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: No new files were added in the diff (Added: 0). There is no evidence that the required SVG assets were created/placed under frontend/public/assets/generated/.

missing_requirements.requirement: Export and include required raster deliverables (512x512 app icon PNG, 32x32 favicon PNG) and white monochrome SVGs (full + icon-only) with specified filenames under frontend/public/assets/generated/.
missing_requirements.reason: No new PNG/SVG asset files were added in the diff (Added: 0). index.html references PNGs, but the diff provides no evidence the files exist in the repo.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the frontend loads logo/favicon from correct public asset paths; update Header, Footer, index.html; ensure no broken legacy references remain; ensure OG/Twitter image references point to an existing PNG under /assets/generated/.
missing_requirements.reason: Header/Footer/index.html paths were updated, but the diff does not show the referenced assets actually exist (no added files), and there is no evidence that other legacy references across the frontend were audited/removed.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale UI/page redesigns and new route/page additions (Privacy Policy/Terms/Refund), booking-step redesign, new listing card variants, new modals, new query hooks, tailwind/css enhancements, etc.
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are not requested (request is branding/asset + loading paths only), and the only concrete code diffs shown are Header/Footer/index.html plus metadata files. The only evidence of these features is the narrative content inside frontend-file-summaries.txt, which appears unrelated to the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Modification of broader project state tracking marking the work as pending requests (AR-* entries) beyond implementing the actual assets.
hallucinated_features.reason: Updating project_state.json is not explicitly requested as part of branding assets + frontend loading paths; it adds project-management metadata rather than implementing the asset deliverables.
